name: spo-quicklink-wp-creator
title: Create a Quick Links web part with items defined in a datasource
shortDescription: This script will enable you to create a Quick Links web part where the items are defined in some kind of data source
longDescription: This script will enable you to create a Quick Links web part where the items are defined in some kind of data source, in this case a SharePoint list. However it could just as well be a csv or similar.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
